name: Tower Blitz (Pogg)
description:
A very old game, if not my first actual attempt at making a game. This project's concept eventually evolved into the basis of Knife To Meet Yu, taking the mechanics of a vertical-moving platformer game with randomized elements.

Disclaimer: The character depicted in the game is referred to as a "Wogg", meant to be from the word "Pollywog". After learning about the word being derogatory in nature in some countries, they have since been renamed to "Poggs".
